title: Videos tab sponsored watch feed (mock, frontend-only)

requirements.summary: Replace Videos placeholder with a scrollable sponsored/ad-style feed using client-side mock items (no backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the Videos tab shows a feed of at least 3 sponsored/ad-style items instead of the current “Videos is coming soon.” card.
Each feed item is clearly labeled in English as sponsored content (e.g., “Sponsored”).
Each feed item has a thumbnail image, a short title, and a short description (English).
No backend canister methods are added/changed to support this feed.

file_operations.description: Create client-only mock sponsored video item data (>= 3 items) including English title/description, a static thumbnail path under frontend/public/assets/generated/, and any lightweight metadata needed for the watch viewer.

Implement a scrollable feed UI rendering the mock sponsored items with clear “Sponsored” labeling, thumbnail, title, and description. Use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Card, Badge, Button) for consistent styling; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Replace the placeholder Card with the new sponsored feed UI, wiring in SponsoredVideoFeed and ensuring the page layout supports scrolling and typical app container spacing. Use shadcn-ui components where helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an in-app watch viewer (modal/sheet) for sponsored items with simulated playback progress and close/back control, fully client-side.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking/tapping a sponsored item opens a dedicated viewer (modal/sheet/page section) that presents the ad item in a watchable format.
The viewer includes a visible progress indicator that advances automatically (e.g., 10–15 seconds) and provides a clear close/back control.
User-facing labels and messaging are in English and do not claim the content is from a real ad network.

file_operations.description: Create a dedicated viewer component that displays the selected sponsored item in a full-bleed vertical format (thumbnail as the visual), includes item details, and provides a clear close/back control. Use shadcn-ui Dialog or Sheet to present the viewer as a modal/sheet; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Add a small React hook that simulates playback by advancing a progress value over a fixed duration (e.g., 10–15 seconds), supports reset on open/item change, and stops/cleans up timers on close/unmount.

Wire feed item click/tap to open the SponsoredVideoViewer modal/sheet and pass the selected item. Ensure labels remain clearly “Sponsored” and avoid any wording implying a real ad network. Use shadcn-ui trigger/control components as needed; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add an English demo-content disclaimer to Videos tab and ensure feed/viewer are responsive on mobile and desktop without horizontal overflow.
acceptanceCriteria: A short disclaimer appears in the Videos tab (e.g., near the top of the feed) indicating the items are sample/demo sponsored content.
The feed and viewer are responsive and usable on small mobile screens and desktop widths without horizontal overflow.

file_operations.description: Add a small English disclaimer near the top of the Videos feed (e.g., “Demo sponsored content for preview purposes.”). Ensure layout uses responsive Tailwind classes and avoids horizontal overflow at common mobile/desktop widths. Use shadcn-ui typography-friendly components (Card, Alert, etc.) if desired; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Ensure the viewer modal/sheet layout is responsive: full-height vertical viewer on mobile, centered/max-width presentation on desktop, and no horizontal overflow. Keep user-facing text in English and clearly demo/simulated.

requirements.summary: Add required generated ad thumbnail images under frontend/public/assets/generated/ and render them via static paths in the feed (no backend fetch).
acceptanceCriteria: All generated thumbnails exist at `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and are referenced by the Videos tab via static paths (e.g., `/assets/generated/...`).
Thumbnails render crisply (no broken images) in both light and dark mode.

file_operations.description: Add the generated thumbnail image asset for sponsored item 1 at the exact required path.
Add the generated thumbnail image asset for sponsored item 2 at the exact required path.
Add the generated thumbnail image asset for sponsored item 3 at the exact required path.

Reference the generated thumbnails via static public paths that map to these exact files: frontend/public/assets/generated/vibechat-sponsored-1.dim_720x1280.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vibechat-sponsored-2.dim_720x1280.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/vibechat-sponsored-3.dim_720x1280.png.

Render thumbnails from the static generated assets (not via backend). Ensure images display without breaking in both light and dark mode (e.g., appropriate object-fit, background, and border styling). Use shadcn-ui components where helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
